name: @kiwicom/orbit-components
description: Orbit-components is a React component library which provides developers with the easiest possible way of building Kiwi.comâ€™s products.

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:icons && yarn build:iconFont && yarn build:typeFiles && yarn build:lib && yarn build:module && yarn build:umd && yarn build:storybook
scripts.build:module: yarn babel-base --env-name esm --out-dir es && yarn copy:module
scripts.build:iconFont: babel-node config/createSVGFont.js && cd src/icons/; zip -r ../../orbit-svgs.zip ./svg; cd -; zip -j orbit-svgs.zip orbit-icons-font/orbit-icons.svg && zip -r orbit-icons-font.zip orbit-icons-font
scripts.copy:lib: copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.md' lib && copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.js.flow' lib && copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.json' lib && copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.d.ts' lib
scripts.copy:module: copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.md' es && copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.js.flow' es && copyfiles -u 1 'src/**/*.json' es
